desc: Lovely Margarethe helps moms dress their kids with only high-quality, sustainably produced, fashionable outerwear and must-haves. Our collections are inspired by German and European brands and Old-World wisdom. Rent our kids’ essentials month-to-month without paying a deposit or creating an account.

layout.text: Lovely Margarethe helps parents equip their kids with only high-quality, sustainably produced, fashionable outerwear and must-haves.
